body.p: A custom framework (document type) can be created using a special XML descriptor filea special XML descriptor file, either from scratch or by extending an existing built-in framework (such as DITA or DocBook) and then making modifications to it.

The Compile Framework Script helps you to compile the script into the *.framework file that represents the framework configuration. Although is now able to automatically compile and load scripts, you might want to compile it yourself to obtain the resulting *.framework file if your framework runs on a different version of .

section.title: Arguments for the Compile Framework Script

dlentry.dd: A list of space-separated Framework Extension Script FilesFramework Extension Script Files (*.exf) or directories in file syntax form. If a directory is specified, the Framework Extension Script FilesFramework Extension Script Files are searched for inside it and in its child directories.
